LanguageData.Quest_BanditCamp.label: bandit camp quest
LanguageData.Quest_BanditCamp.letterText:
{0}, {1} of {2}, has sent us a message.

Apparently bandits based in a nearby camp have been raiding their caravans. They've asked us to destroy it, which means eliminating all enemies and turrets.

If we succeed, their relations will improve, and they'll send us this reward:

{3}

LanguageData.Quest_DownedRefugee.label: incapacitated refugee quest
LanguageData.Quest_DownedRefugee.letterText:
[PAWN_nameDef] contacts you and requests help. [PAWN_pronoun] is wounded and unable to move. Without your help, [PAWN_pronoun] will die in {0} days.

[PAWN_nameDef] is a {1}-year-old {2}. [PAWN_pronoun] promises to join you if you rescue [PAWN_objective].

It may be dangerous there, so beware.
LanguageData.Quest_PrisonerRescue.label: prisoner rescue quest
LanguageData.Quest_PrisonerRescue.letterText: A prisoner being held by {0} has managed to steal a radio and call you!\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] is being held at a camp nearby under armed guard. Rescue [PAWN_objective], and [PAWN_pronoun] will join your colony. [PAWN_pronoun] is a {1}-year-old {2}.
LanguageData.Quest_PeaceTalks.label: peace talks quest
LanguageData.Quest_PeaceTalks.letterText:
[PAWN_nameDef], {0} of {1}, has sent us a message. [PAWN_pronoun] wants to talk with us in a nearby location.

It could be a great opportunity to improve relations with their faction, but beware - a poor negotiator can cause more harm than good and even anger them.

The offer will expire after {2} days.
